website_summaries.verdict: The House of Marley Rebel BT headphones deliver Bluetooth audio with thunderous bass response.
pros: Powerful audio performance with deep bass response and well-defined highs
Comes with cable for wired listening—cable also has inline remote
cons: Massive bass is not for those seeking an accurate frequency response

customer_reviews.title: adequate noise reduction and good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised to find that the reviews on this relatively inexpensive, yet dynamic set of bluetooth headphones are spot on! This is an incredible value - sound quality with depth and clarity, adequate noise reduction and good battery life! Sure, they look a little silly in the grocery store, but hey, you can't beat the cost for the sound quality. HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Fragile Plastic That Will Break Easily
customer_reviews.text: These are poorly designed and will break within a couple months of use. There are screws holding the plastic earpieces to another plastic piece that holds the headband in place. These are held together by 4 fragile pieces of cheap plastic with screws in them. The sound is really good, but they are mostly made of plastic and made to break easily. I have owned four other House of Marley products, and they were built much stronger than these headphones. You can see the photos I've added, that the plastic holding these two together will break. I would recommend you choose a different item that is more durable. This one breaks very easily.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to pair and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to pair and use, but the volume rocker was broken out of the box. They're not terribly comfortable or loud, which is unfortunate since they don't block much noise. Battery life is good, but they can't seem to process audio very quickly - when I stream music from my ipad a few feet away it begins to stutter and skip after a few minutes
customer_reviews.author: M. Loew

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money - would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I got a set as a gift via my employer and like 'em so much I got another for my son. The sound is a bit "bassy", but that's by design (it is "House of Marley"); they sound very good. Although not noise-canceling" they do a very good job of reducing exterior noise. The controls are intuitive, and the Bluetooth works very well with my iPhone. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great except one issue.
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, comfortable and great price! Did have one issue though. After charging for the second time the red light on power button wound not go off and I could not turn them on. I tried combinations of buttons and red light wouldn't go out. Plugged in the headphone jack for the hell of it and light went out and the wireless worked as it should.
customer_reviews.author: garyc

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but has a too much base
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, but has a too much base...use the "Base Reducer" EQ setting in iOS music for a more relaxed listening experience.
customer_reviews.author: Hisham A

customer_reviews.title: Buzzes Constantly
customer_reviews.text: While listening to loud music, the constant low-level whine/buzz is undetectable. Listening to podcasts, however, drives me nuts: IT NEVER STOPS! Not sure why this product always whines like this; I've tried it on different sources, but every time I play something with low volume and/or dead air, it becomes a dominating feature of my experience. I'm really not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nereid Lake

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound. These are great headphones for sound quality as well as for how long their charge last. The quality of materials is top notch and feels like they will last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value and sound
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. They are an amazing deal for the quality of sound. They are super comfortable and the battery life is outstanding per charge. Only very minor gripe would be if you bend down, they tend to slip off your head. I own a few different wireless headphones (in ear, behind ear) but these are my go-to's.
customer_reviews.author: Christa A Limone

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, couldn't ask for more out of these for the price. Great bass and clarity, even when connected via Bluetooth. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Bt is weak
customer_reviews.text: They sound ok but have poor Bluetooth connection. Walking with phone in pocket gives distortion, no where near as good of a connection as my se215bt
customer_reviews.author: John LeBel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I may be doing something wrong, but I can't get these ear phones to hold a charge and actually work wireless. This is my 2nd pair, I returned the first pair, and am having the same problem. I have it charging all day and still can't get it to work wirelessly. When I use with the wire, music sounds bad and staticy. Overall not happy with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kraft

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really enjoying my headphones. For the price, you can’t beat the quality. Very happy to have bought them. When I need an upgrade I’ll probably try out the other Marley headphones. I used to buy their earphones and also liked them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: A gift from my son & daughter (in law) - a wonderful way to say I love you with such a wonderful gift; I was pleasantly surprised. These earphones are amazing - great sound and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: h h

customer_reviews.title: Great buya
customer_reviews.text: These sound better than the non-bluetooth version of these I had originally. Im really glad i upgraded. You can use these head phones with the audio jack when the bluetooth battery is completely dead. As for sound, they are a little brassy, and I usually change my audio settings when I use these. Still, worth it, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mdmiller84

customer_reviews.title: Can’t charge the batteries anymore
customer_reviews.text: The re-charge port quickly broke. No we use them as wired headphones
customer_reviews.author: Denise L Christensen

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: these are great headphones, this is the 2nd pair we've purchased. the first pair lasted several years but snapped across the headband part, other than that they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Far more than I expected. The sound quality is ON POINT. You can barely hear anything outside of the music even at half volume. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Farm Dude

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these!! So good I bought a second pair for myself. I initially purchased 5hem for my 9 year old son, the sound quality was so good I had to come back again. For the quality and price, these are awesome
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The House of Marley Rebel Wireless Bluetooth Over Ear Headphones with a Microphone are better than I expected. For the price, the sound quality is good, material feel is good, the battery life (and charging speed!) is great and the microphone is great (better than I expected). The one "okay" I would assign to these headphones is the size of the muffs - I'd like them to be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when they first came out. Since then I put them through the ringer and they finally broke after much abuse. I was so please that I went with a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Its fantastic not having a chord dangling in my way all ...
customer_reviews.text: So far these are working perfectly! Its fantastic not having a chord dangling in my way all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Marshal Uhls

customer_reviews.title: Battery and connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I brought the product on February and the headphone battery life now is 0 and I try several products but the device is not work anymore and the warranty web page is from another country.
customer_reviews.author: guillermo rivera ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was a quick- let me replace my broken headphones purchase. It works wonderfully and the sound quality is phenomenal. Love the bluetooth and design. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: N. Bean

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are da bomb
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of headphones. Comfortable and sound great. Own 2 of them now. House of Marley has always been my go to for great audio listening devices for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: celtic34fan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Like that I can attach them with a chord on planes and other non Bluetooth devices. Sound quality is only ok. My volume buttons also stick frequently.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy with this product, but it got broken in less than 3 months, considering that this is a good brand I thought I was going to use them I little bit more than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Randall S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound from these little headphones, want a lightweight set of headphones with bass, here's one.
customer_reviews.author: Bam3vO

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great sound, good materials, lot of bass so check it out and, a little small for my big head.
customer_reviews.author: Alboher

customer_reviews.title: Good but mostly BAD
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are built very well, ashame the bluetooth is not modern and cuts in and out and is very choppy. Don't waste you money
customer_reviews.author: Cristian Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: love them but..
customer_reviews.text: the shape of them really make it hard to wear for long periods of time
customer_reviews.author: andres lillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I needed. Bluetooth for everyday music listening and corded for music performing. Holds a good charge and has controls on the earpiece. Sit on top of ear and not cupped is more comfortable to me. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: ... fly with these all the time and they are great..
customer_reviews.text: I fly with these all the time and they are great... especially to get a top notch brand for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Sivert

customer_reviews.title: Love the headphone they work excellent and the battery is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphone they work excellent and the battery is great. My only thing is I wish the cord worked better but I purchased it to use it wireless anyway so can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was not disappointed. These headphones are comfortable and have GREAT sound
customer_reviews.text: Ordered due to the number of positive reviews, was not disappointed. These headphones are comfortable and have GREAT sound. As long as they hold up structurally they'll be the perfect BT headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Stephi

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and bass. Need slight change !
customer_reviews.text: I love the bass and volume its great. But i hope you can make the head part foldable in future like sony and others, so that its easier and safer to put into bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rutul T.

customer_reviews.title: Buy House of Marley....
customer_reviews.text: These freakin rock!!!!! Can't beat the price. I will purchase The Rebel again.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie H.

customer_reviews.title: For the most part, great headphones...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, connects easily, good build quality, but gets very uncomfortable when wearing for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Being free of cords is fantastic, but these headphones hurt my ears after about ...
customer_reviews.text: Being free of cords is fantastic, but these headphones hurt my ears after about 1-2 hours of wear. I'll go for an over-ear headset next time instead of an on-ear headset.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Marshall

customer_reviews.title: I like this product quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product , what you see is what you get Very good sound quality Durable and without mooving parts, very good for flights
customer_reviews.author: Ran Israeli

customer_reviews.title: Broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: They broke immediately. On the second day of use they would continuously skip songs on multiple streaming platforms.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wallas

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones with slight design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these headphones. Only drawback is the ear pieces slide up and down a little too easily.
customer_reviews.author: prentissbay

customer_reviews.title: Overall ... good
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound, the battery life and feel on the ears. I dropped it and it works still but there is something shaking in the right ear. If I didn't drop it, it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good listening experience. On/Off button hard to manipulate. Not sure when on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy G.

customer_reviews.title: it was a great product. The packaging was a bit unorganized when ...
customer_reviews.text: it was a great product. The packaging was a bit unorganized when I opened the box but thats okay because the headphones bluetooth work amazingly and sound quality I guess was good but don't really know saying thing about sound quality. But overall it was a great product.
customer_reviews.author: MPanadaGT

customer_reviews.title: Marley
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and very loud... love the color and the design. Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Yee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a long time and very good
customer_reviews.author: Peretz Barkan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best I will always buy Marley products. Well made and good sound
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and a nice and full body sound, I love how the surround works.
customer_reviews.author: Pieross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Connection wireless range is about 20m
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Connection wireless range is about 20m. Very good sound and most comfortable device.
customer_reviews.author: Amir Michaelis

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: The on and off button break after 2 weeks of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Awesomeness!
customer_reviews.text: How on earth am I just now hearing about House of Marley?!!! I had been so disappointed in not being able to afford the Soundlink BT phones from Bose. When I chose to get these Rebels, I figured I'd be settling for a lesser quality product. NOT SO!!! These phones are the Soundlink's equivalent if not better! Needless to say, I am hugely pleased with the Rebel BT's. Time to start telling my family and friends about them! What a great surprise!
customer_reviews.author: FiSH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good vibes, soft and the hours of bluetooth its fine I recomend this headphones
customer_reviews.author: Josue Vivanco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them didn’t know it had a mic for calls ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Belinda D

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive BT headphones for late night use
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive BT headphones for late night use. They are not comfortable enough to wear for many hours, but work just fine. The audio quality is decent for the price, but these are not studio monitors.
customer_reviews.author: DadInGeorgia

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, amazing price for quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones! These are the first ones I have ever owned and amazing quality of sound for the price. They have a very comfortable fit on the ear and very convenient controls on the headset to play/pause or skip a song or to increase or decrease volume. Bluetooth range is quite long and excellent reception. Also On my iPhone, when paired it tells me how much battery it has. Amazing headphones for the price. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Luis Navarrete

customer_reviews.title: I hated it. I returned it within 30 mins of ...
customer_reviews.text: I hated it. I returned it within 30 mins of usage. The fit was very off and uncomfortable. The quality was worse than 10 Dollar In ear headphones. Was looking forward to it but had to return it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Saleem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift will update when my son gets it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula dick

customer_reviews.title: Only one product better at that price
customer_reviews.text: Average, yes they are worth 35+ $. Only one product better at that price. But can say, just find out for yourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Dalila

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old grandson borrows these from his mom, so I bought them for Christmas. He loves his mom's so I know he will love these.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE MILNER

customer_reviews.title: Nice audio with a lot of bass
customer_reviews.text: Very nice audio quality with a lot of bass, a strong bluetooth connection. Moderate comfort only, a strange and unstable sizing mechanism. Bass overshadows the high frequencies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: House of Marley EM-JH101-BK Rebel Wireless Bluetooth On Ear Headphones with a Microphone, Black,Large
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackThe REBEL BT on-ear headphones deliver all the same sustainable comforts as it’s wired little brother with added Bluetooth technology. With a powerful 40mm driver and 8 hours of continuous play, keep your soundtrack queued up all day. The optional cable with in-line microphone and a 1-button remote has you covered when you need to plug in. Press play and get ready for the wireless revolution.

House of Marley is built on the principles of superior quality, sustainability and a commitment to charitable causes. We are driven to enhance lives through great product experiences as well as using proceeds from product sales to support global reforestry through our foundation, Project Marley.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR SOUND: Enjoy a truly impressive high performance sound quality. The headphones are acoustically perfected and balanced with 40mm dynamic drivers that offer maximum bass. These are perfect to take with you when you travel

STATE-OF-THE-ART FEATURES: The wireless headset has a removable 1-button microphone on the cable for ease of use that allows you to play, pause, and skip your music. Wear the headphones confidently as they are solid, durable and wear resistant

ECO-FRIENDLY DESIGN: The Rebel on-ear headphones are made of Regrind silicone rubber and have a durable polymer headband that make these headphones fit so comfortable you could forget you’re wearing them

RECHARGEABLE & COMPATIBLE: These headphones have a rechargeable lithium ion battery that allows you 10 hours of continuous Bluetooth playing capability. These are equipped with Bluetooth technology that allows you to connect to your phone

HOUSE OF MARLEY: House of Marley is built on the principles of superior quality, sustainability and a commitment to charitable causes while enhancing lives through great product experiences as well as using proceeds to support global reforestry

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars430 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
